Description: Throw your spear, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.2H_Spear_Javelin.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_thrust_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">staggering</font> on hit.
Targets are <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">knocked down</font> on hit.

Headshots reduce Javelin's <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">cooldown</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_Javelin_CDROnHeadshot.cooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.

Javelin deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">2.5%</font> bonus damage per meter traveled. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max 100%.)</font>

Sweep the target's legs, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.2H_Spear_Sweep.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_strike_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage and causing a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">knock down</font>.

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Grit</font> is now active during the attack.<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">\n\n(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)</font>

Press basic attack during Sweep to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">follow up</font> with a heavy stab that deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.2H_Spear_Sweep_Finish.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_thrust_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage.
Restore <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_Cyclone_BonusStaminaOnMultiHit.Stamina]}</font> stamina per target hit.

Cyclone now <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">pushes</font> the target back <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.2H_Spear_Cyclone_Pushback.ImpactDistanceY]}m</font>.

Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_BonusHvyDmgConsec.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> increased damage on consecutive heavy attacks against a single target. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_BonusHvyDmgConsec.MaxConsecutiveHits]} stacks.)</font>

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Critical chance</font> is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_BonusCritChanceAtRng.CritChance * 100]}%</font> when attacking targets that are at least <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">3m</font> away.

Successful heavy attacks reduce all spear <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">cooldowns</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_CDROnHvyHit.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max 1 reduction per attack.)</font>

Dodging consumes <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">20%</font> less stamina for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_ReducedDodgeStamCost.BaseDuration]}s</font> after a successful hit.
Restore <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_BonusStaminaOnCrit.Stamina]}</font> stamina on critical hits.

Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_BonusDmgVsKnockedDown.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> increased damage against <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">knocked down</font> targets.

Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">fortify</font> after successful heavy attacks, increasing armor by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_FortifyOnHvyHit.PhysicalArmor * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_FortifyOnHvyHit.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Stamina regeneration rate is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_BonusStamRegenOnLowStam.StaminaRate * 100]}%</font> when your stamina is below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">50%</font>.
Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_BonusDmgMaxStamina.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> increased damage while stamina is full.

Rush forward and skewer your target, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.2H_Spear_Skewer_Stab.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_thrust_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage and applying <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">bleed</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Bleed</font> deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_Skewer_Bleed.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_bleed_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage every <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_Skewer_Bleed.TickRate]}s</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_Skewer_Bleed.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Skewer deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_Skewer_BonusDmgVsMaxHP.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> increased damage against targets that have full health.

Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">empower</font> if Skewer critical hits, increasing damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_Skewer_EmpowerOnCrit.DMGThrust * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_Skewer_EmpowerOnCrit.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Bleed</font> duration increased to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_Skewer_Bleed_Upgrade.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Execute <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">3</font> quick piercing strikes that each deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.2H_Spear_Perforate.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_thrust_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage and apply <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">rend</font>, reducing the target's armor by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_Perforate_Rend.PhysicalArmor * -100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_Perforate_Rend.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_Perforate_Rend.StackMax]} stacks.)</font>

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Rend</font> increased to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_Perforate_Rend_Upgrade.PhysicalArmor * -100]}%</font> per strike against targets above <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_Perforate_BonusRend.TargetHealthPercent]}%</font> health.

Each attack inflicts a stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">weaken</font> to the target, reducing target's outgoing damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_Perforate_WeakenStack.DMGStandard * -100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_Perforate_WeakenStack.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_Perforate_WeakenStack.StackMax]} stacks.)</font>

Use your spear to vault forward and kick your target, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.2H_Spear_VaultKick.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_strike_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">staggering</font> them. Applies <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">stun</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_VaultKick_Stun.BaseDuration]}s</font>.<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">\n\nTaunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your spear, this ability inflicts taunt for {[DamageTable.2H_Spear_VaultKick.TauntDuration]}s when it hits. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)</font>

Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">empower</font> after successful hits on targets below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_VaultKick_EmpowerVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]}%</font> health, increasing damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_VaultKick_EmpowerVsLowHP.DMGThrust * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_VaultKick_EmpowerVsLowHP.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Cooldowns for other spear abilities are reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_VaultKick_CDROnHit.cooldownTimer * -100]}%</font> on successful hit. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max 1 reduction per ability use.)</font>

Light attacks have a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_BonusCritChanceOnLight.CritChance * 100]}%</font> increased <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">critical chance</font>.

All spear ability <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">cooldowns</font> are reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_CDROnLight.cooldownTimer * -100]}%</font> on the second hit of the light attack chain. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max 1 reduction per attack.)</font>

The last hit of the light attack chain applies <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_SlowOnLightVsLowHP.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}% slow</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_SlowOnLightVsLowHP.BaseDuration]}s</font> to targets below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_SlowOnLightVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]}%</font> health. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Slow reduces target's movement speed.)</font>

Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_BonusDmgVsLowHP.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> increased damage against targets with less than <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_BonusDmgVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]}%</font> health.

Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_BonusDmgVsGrit.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> increased damage against targets with active <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">grit</font>.

The first successful hit with an ability within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_CDROnHitAfterDodge.BaseDuration]}s</font> of dodging reduces all spear cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_CDROnHitAfterDodge.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max 1 reduction per ability use.)</font>

Critical hits extend the duration of your spear <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuffs</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_ExtendDebuffOnCrit.TargetStatusEffectDurationMult * 100]}%</font>.

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Critical chance</font> is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_BonusCritChanceVsBleed.CritChance * 100]}%</font> when attacking a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">bleeding</font> target.

Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_BonusDmgVsDebuff.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> bonus damage for each <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuff</font> on your target. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max 30%.)</font>
